FindTheCulprit.MissingDependency: {module} requires a module with ID {dependency}, which is not installed!

BinarySearchStep.StatsData: {numRemaining} modules still in the list. {stepsLeft} or fewer steps remain.

Error.SelectModsSingleton: Only one SelectMods app is allowed to exist.

IPWOS.BlameModules: Seems like the issue is a bug in your chosen module list:
IPWOS.BlameCoreOrSystem: Seems like the issue is a bug in the game system or the core software.

SelectMods.DisabledBecauseLocked: To deselect this module, unlock it first.
SelectMods.ForceLockedBecauseLibraryTooltip: This module cannot be unlocked while the Lock Libraries box is checked above.
SelectMods.LockedTooltip: This module is locked. Click to unlock it.
SelectMods.LibrariesLockedTooltip: All modules marked as libraries are force locked.
SelectMods.LibrariesUnlockedTooltip: Library modules are being treated normally.
SelectMods.UnlockedTooltip: This module is unlocked. Click to lock it. Locked status is remembered.

Usage.P1: After clicking Start, the page will refresh and you will be prompted to check whether your issue still exists. This may repeat multiple times until the culprit was found.
Usage.P2: After the culprit was found you will be able to choose whether you want to return your active modules list to its pre-run state.
Usage.P3: Don't worry if you accidently close one of the popups, just refresh the page manually and it will reappear.

StartOfRun.AllModulesDeactivated: All modules, except your chosen ones, are deactivated.
